fields.name: NoSpaf
fields.fieldText:
Step 1 of 4


Please Search for End User to expedite the Spiff Claim Processing, if you cannot find, then you can enter via text.


To Search for Account, type at least characters and as you type, options will appear. Click Enter to do a full search.

To Search for Account, type at least characters and as you type, options will appear. Click Enter to do a full search.

fields.name: confirmationText_0
fields.fieldText: Thanks for your submission. Our team may verify the sale. If they need any additional information, they will contact you.

fields.name: confirmationText_0_0
fields.fieldText:
Thanks for your submission. Our team will verify the claim. If they need any additional information, they will contact you.


Once the claim is approved, you will get a notification. Feel free to contact your sales rep if you have any question or need assistance with this SPIFF claim.

fields.name: spaNumberHeader
fields.fieldText:
Step 1 of 4


If there is a SPA for this deal, Select the Deal and the information will be added, if you do not see the Spa number, click No Spa button on bottom of this screen.

value.stringValue: No Spa, Search for End User

fields.name: Additional
fields.fieldText:
Step 4 of 4


You can add documentation to your request. Purchase orders, shipping information or other supporting documentation.


It is not required to submit the initial request but it may help if we cannot find the sale or have additional questions.
